name: orca-web-clipper-plugin
description: Orca Web Clipper Plugin - Receives clips via Clipboard

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --format=esm --external:react --external:react-dom --platform=browser --banner:js="const React = window.React; const ReactDOM = window.ReactDOM;"
scripts.watch: esbuild src/index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --format=esm --external:react --external:react-dom --platform=browser --banner:js="const React = window.React; const ReactDOM = window.ReactDOM;" --watch
